document_data.name: Povalo Lurian
document_data.home: [[Nobles District]],{{Cite document/Procampur City Expansion Packet|4}} [[Procampur]], [[the Vast]]
document_data.mainbody: Lord Consul '''Povalo Lurian''' was a noble of House [[Lurian]] in the city of [[Procampur]] in [[the Vast]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite document/Procampur City Expansion Packet|9}}{{Cite web/House Lurian}}
document_data.Activities: As head of House Lurian, he was involved in the family's [[gold]]-smithing business.{{Cite document/Procampur City Expansion Packet|6}}
document_data.Relationships: His wife was High Lady [[Jasmine Lurian]] and they had some children.While several other members of House Lurian are known, their relationships are unknown, though some are most likely intended to be the children of Povalo and Jasmine.
document_data.History: He was head of the family by [[1370 DR]], when he was aged 55.
